caption: Why are you in business if you cannot follow instructions? I asked for white sauce and red sauce and got zero.
Staff and owner are wonderfully professional and kind. Their new slider kebab is absolutely delicious and the perfect size  when you're on the move.
We got the wrap to share and it was amazing! It hit all the right notes and the ingredients were super fresh. Definitely recommend!
Had a awesome experience in this place with my daughter. The food came rapidly and the customer service is just good. Prices are convenient.
I absolutely love the food and service, good area right next to where I live. The cashiers are always welcoming. Highly recommended.

Excellent! We had never had doner kebab even though we visited Berlin twice. We received the box dinner through Baldor. Just sensational. I can't wait to visit the restaurant. The delicious, savory chicken combined with the pickled vegetables, sauces, and other toppings is totally umami and wonderful.
Very well kept and welcoming place. They provide generous meals and for affordable rates. I liked the food very much and the waiters were super personal and explanatory. Recommended.
I visit this place a lot since I work nearby. I must say their service is always great and they keep the place well kept all the time. Pricing is reasonable and they serve generous portions.
overpriced turkish garbage

We like a lot eating out. Yesterday we  visited this delicious place which friends told us about. We passed a beautiful evening there with great food and  an experienced stuff and  a professional  chef. We  added this restaurant in our phone list  and we will no doubt visit again soon. We highly recommend.

This place is the one I like best. I go to plenty of restaurants but to this restaurant I go the most. The crew is very professional and the cuisine they offer is so yummy. I never miss an opportunity to have a good meal here. I recommend this place with pleasure.
Dry and overpriced. Got 3 sandwiches. Asked for extra sauce and they charged us 2.70 for those 2 little containers. Friend didn’t even finish his.

We arrived at this restaurant for lunch. we heard about this spot from quite a few people.  Well, it was very successful. The staff members welcomed us with a smile and we had an excellent feeling. The food was just great. We had a great time and we will visit this place again. we highly recommend this place.
Friendly lady that worked the desk, was very nice

One of the few surviving places from the food court at city point and possibly possibly the reason why?  Is, they do have good food. I have tried them on several occasions. They have always been consistent and timely with their food and service. I like this place😋 #ShopLocal

From the first moment  you arrive in this restaurant  the stuff gives you an enjoyable feeling. Very comfortable stuff, it is a friendly place to  enjoy with your friends or with your date. Great  cooking, qualified  chef, decent  price and excellent  service. Highly recommended.
This spot obviously knows how to take care of their customers. Regularly with a very friendly attitude. The food is conveniently priced, regularly fresh and neat.
Food is delicious, staff is a delight and they are taking all of the necessary COVID precautions...what more could you ask for

At the first moment  you step in that restaurant  they give you a comfortable feeling. Very comfortable waiters, it is a good place to  enjoy with buddies or with your date. delightful  cuisine, experienced  chef de cuisine, modest  price and generous  service. Highly recommended.
Worth the price around 15 per kebab but really delicious nothing to envy to the original in Berlin

(Translated by Google) Really. Heard about it on TV and thought give it a try. During my New York vacation with my son, we took the subway, 45 minutes on the road and then that. We couldn't find much positive. It is definitely not a Berlin doner kebab. Almost $ 13 + tip for a doner kebab? That is 4 times as much as it costs in Berlin! The meat was thick lumps from the warming container, very little in terms of quantity and the taste had only a little to do with a Berlin doner kebab. The red and white cabbage was completely missing for whatever reason and of course the chilli flakes. Additional spice powder on the kebab? What for? Maybe the makers should try again in Berlin to know how the original can and should taste. Good sauces are also important here. A sharp knife to cut the THIN strips of meat could also help. The only good thing was the bread. For $ 30 for 2 people without drinks, I wouldn't go back. P.S. The lemon juice that you put on it doesn't go well with it and I haven't had it in Berlin yet. No recommendation from me sorry. The review refers to summer 2019, maybe that's better now.  (Original) Also echt mal. Hatte im TV davon gehört und dachte mal probieren. Beim meinem New York Urlaub mit Sohnemann ab in die Subway, 45 Minuten unterwegs und dann das. Viel Positives konnten wir nicht finden. Ein Berliner Döner ist das definitiv  nicht. Knapp 13 Dollar +Tip für nen Döner? Das ist 4 mal so viel wie er in Berlin kostet! Das Fleisch waren dicke Klumpen aus dem Wärmebehälter, von der Menge her sehr wenig und der Geschmack hatte nur entfernt etwas mit einem Berliner Döner zu tun. Das Rot- und Weißkraut fehlte komplett warum auch immer und natürlich die Chilli Flocken. Zusätzlich Gewürzpulver auf den Döner? Wofür das denn? Eventuell sollten die Macher mal wieder in Berlin probieren, um zu wissen wie das Original schmecken kann und sollte. Gute Saucen sind auch hier wichtig. Auch ein scharfes Messer zum abschneiden der DÜNNEN Fleischstreifen könnte helfen. Einzig gut war das Brot. Für 30 Dollar für 2 Personen ohne Getränke, würde ich hier nicht wieder kommen. P.S. Auch der Zitronensaft den ihr drauf kippt passt so gar nicht dazu und habe ich in Berlin auch noch nicht gehabt. Keine Empfehlung von mir sorry. Die Rezension  bezieht sich auf den Sommer 2019, eventuell ist das jetzt besser.
Fantastic ambience and very attentive service. The meals were fresh and yummy. Will easily recommend this spot to others. Fair prices and big portions. Great work.

Did the sidewalk operation and delicious. Just had the kebab but a fresh good sized well balanced meal all by itself. Did all the works. Mix it all together With a fork to get the best flavors and eat the sauce soaked bread later.

We love Berlin style döner so much. We have made the trip to Brooklyn from CT, just to have some. Now that the coronavirus has hit, we can't go to sit in but the owner delivers, so we drive down to Greenwich, CT and meet in a lot to pick it up in order to fulfill our craving. The owner is very pleasant and the food is so delicious. I recommend it to everyone.
I prefer this restaurant very much. there is a happy air. The food is wonderful. the service is effective and the stuff is polite. The cost is fair. extremely recommend.
long live the kebab king malte
Better than the authentic Berlin Dönner Kebab

I like this spot! They provide awesome food, their menu is nice, The chef in that spot is very experienced, I like very much eating all their food. The dishes are consistently tasty, the service towards the visitors  is good. I frequently visit this place and I was never unhappy. I recommend it with no hesitation.
They offer a great range of delicious food. I liked dining here. Staff members are always welcoming, pricing is fair and the spot is always well organised.
One of my favorite places to grab some food. good location, clean, and excellent customer service. I recommend this place!

Where do I even start? I LOVE THIS PLACE. All caps intended. Whenever I’m looking for something flavorful, authentic, and filling, I head to Kotti Döner. BUT it doesn’t make you feel TOO full after stuffing your face because their ingredients are so fresh! Yes. Yes. Yes.
Would surely recommend trying this spot. Exceptional vibes, delightful dishes, excellent customer service. 5 stars.
Great food, helpful staff members, regularly excellent mood. They charge affordable prices and the food quality is great. Kudos.
Friendly service and delicious food

I ordered the signature Berliner Döner Kebab and did not look back. Really excellent lunch option especially if you have a big appetite and have time to sit down and eat your meal. The sandwich itself is huge, almost unwieldy, overstuffed with fresh veggies. It's definitely a messy meal no matter how you handle it but it's all worth it. What really makes this "sandwich" stand out is the crispy sesame bread. I wouldn't mind having less of everything else to have a better balance of the bread. One thing I have to say that the chicken in the kebab does pale in comparison to the bread, vegetables, and sauce. I found it a little on the bland side if eaten alone (without sauce and vegs).

I admire this restaurant! They prepare first-cleass food, their menu is decent, The cook in that restaurant is a specialist, I love very much tasting all their dishes. The dishes are always fresh and tasty, the service towards the guests  is efficient. I often eat in this place and I was never discontended. I recommend this place.
Very tasty Durum Doner Kebabs (the origin of Shawarma). So, if you like shawarmas, you gotta try out this restaurant.
Great

After being spoiled by Doner Kebab in Germany, my wife and I like to eat it whenever we come across the opportunity. Kotti Berliner was no exception to our Doner experiences thus far. It was delicious, quick service. Hit the spot! Also, the market it’s in is kickass. Plenty of drinks option (there is craft beer right behind Kotti Berliner) and plenty of space to sit. Enjoy!
Would certainly recommend visiting this place. Great mood, tasty food, fantastic customer service. I recommend this place.
Tasty sauces and best Doner Kebab that I have found in NYC. Closest thing to the true Berlin Doner Kebab
Their food is sooooo good! The chicken is so moist, juicy, and flavorful! When I have to go down to metro tech, I always stop there to get food!
Doner was good but overpriced.

Had the Turkish Breakfast with my husband just a few days ago. It was awesome. Great value for money and superb flavours. We were treated to tasters of the meat they serve at lunch / dinner and I have to say it blew my mind. Unfortunately we couldn’t get back there again during our stay in NYC but I would urge you to go out of your way to eat at this place!

Not impressed. Overall Döner Kebap was pretty dry with little meat. Being from Germany myself, this product would not be able to compete and probably be out of business. Also find it on the expensive side for what it is.
(Translated by Google) Tasted very good  (Original) Sehr gut geschmeckt

It's a very strange feeling standing in a basement in Brooklyn but feeling like you could be on a sidewalk in Kreuzberg, Berlin. For anyone who has had, loved, and now misses eating authentic Berliner Döner, Kotti manages to accomplish this feat.  Generous portions and delicious food delivered quickly by friendly staff. Highly recommended whether you're missing your time in Berlin or you couldn't pick it out on a map.
This in not real kebab, food is bad, price is high, seating is not comfortable. Not recommended.
So yummy and such nice people! Don’t think scary drunk/hangover food—think fresh fresh FRESH and prepared with care and smiles 😻
Very neat and welcoming spot. They offer generous meals and for fair rates. I loved the meals very much and the waiters were very attentive and explanatory. Recommended.

(Translated by Google) This kebab should be closed. They're just making people. From my experience I have personally poisoned myself in this bar twice.  (Original) Ten kebab powinien być zamknięt. Oni tylko drują ludzi. Z mojego dświadczenia osobiście już dwa razy się zatrułem w tym barze.
This spot is fantastic! Convenient rates, big portions and the employees are regularly nice.

It’s a great place. I had the chicken doner (the classic) and it was good. My only problem with it was that the bread itself wasn’t crunchy enough as the traditional one you get but still was fresh. The staff was great and very knowledgeable.
Awesome food, awesome staff. Worth a special trip!

This experience was the beste I ever had. I ate Döner “ Gyro “ in three different countries but never ever one that was so Delicious it’s was a explosion of different taste and herbs I can’t wait to eat it again it just made me addicted awesome!! By the way I drove over an hour to taste it I would do it again all the time 😍
Awesome atmosphere and very amiable service. The food was crisp and enchanting. Will easily recommend this spot to others. Fair prices and generous meals. Keep it up.
I absolutely loved the food and service, great area right next to my home. The cashiers are always very kind. Highly recommended.
Not even close to a german döner

Visit my brother in Brooklyn, was extremely excited to find out that Döner have made it to the US. Im from Germany and grew up on Turkish Döners. Kotti's is in a really eclectic spot, awesome concept with the multi international cuisine vendors. The Döner, was pretty close to the original at home but still lacking.  The western spin with different seasoning on the chicken was good but not like home.  Still delicious, pricey for the portions!

First time coming to the Dekalb Market, and this was my first stop. I absolutely loved my chicken rice pilaf bowl! The chicken is so flavorful and everything is fresh! I absolutely will come again! Also staff are super friendly!
The place serves large portions and for affordable rates. very welcoming staff members. They never disappoint.

I visit this spot a lot since I work in the area. I like how their customer service is always good and they keep the spot well organized regularly. Pricing is affordable and they serve sizeable portions.

(Translated by Google) As a Berliner, I've never had such a delicious kebab in my life !!!!! Very well grilled meat, fresh salads and those sauces .... amazing! Yoghurt-Lemon / Garlic Sauce is definitely NOT comparable to the Berlin garlic sauce! Hats off and keep it up!  (Original) Ich als Berliner, hatte in meinem Leben noch nie so ein Leckeren Döner!!!!! Sehr gut gegrilltes Fleisch, frische Salate und diese Soßen.... unglaublich! Joghurt-Lemon/Garlic sauce ist definitiv NICHT vergleichbar mit der Berliner Knoblauchsoße! Hut ab und weiter so!
Never again
Certainly a place worth stopping over, the food is awesome and well prepared, the costs are fair and it is consistently clean in here. 5 stars.

I walked past this place everyday for over a year and today I decided to finally give them a try. I had the chicken wrap and it was extremely greasy and bland. You only get flavor from the grease and veggies. My first and last time.
Try the salad. So good
Thet They don't have lamb gyro meat chicken was good
Very good serving size. Chicken is very juicy and tender. All the ingredients taste fresh. Service was quick.

I eat at Kotti at least three times a week. I love the chicken cooked on a spit. It takes me back to my home in Greece (where we also have Turkish inspired foods) and Adrienne puts this perfect char on the chicken for me. I always get the wrap because I gotta watch the carbs but the bread from the sandwich is outstanding and the rice in the bowl is so flavorful. Crispy on the outside warm and chewy on the inside. Go there and get any menu item, you won’t be disappointed. Also, they serve beer!!!

Its 7pm and there are only 2 people working there, the phone keeps ringing and one of then has to decide between keep preparing the food, taking order or pick up the phone.  the other lady is trying to help but she's so slow... the line is getting longer and there's a guy waiting now 5 mins and they haven't taken his order. Plus! there are no seats

(Translated by Google) They make delicious chicken doner kebabs with a German type of sauce, the service is very fast and the staff is quite helpful, they also serve 2 baklavas because they are newly opened and it was also a pleasant surprise. Achievements to the business owner.  (Original) Almanya tipi bol soslu lezzetli tavuk dönerler yapıyorlar, servis çok hızlı ve personel oldukça yardımcı, bir de yeni açıldıkları için 2 adet baklava ikram ediyorlar o da hoş bir sürpriz oldu. İşletme sahibine başarılar.

Food is amazing. Quality is great. Portion size is wonderful. This place serves fresh food. First, time I went to industry city with my girlfriend this was an awesome choice and experience. So much we went again, I had to speak with the owner about more locations in Brooklyn. I recommend even if your vegan.

Excellent food. You must visit if you come shopping to Albee square mall and are in the mood to eat German/Turkish food, you won't be disappointed. We tried the Chicken rice pilaf bowl and Chicken Doner kebab, both tasted great.
Best Chicken in town, high quality, big portions and very friendly staff. I eat there at least once a week :) Keep it up guys

Delicious bread and chicken and the veggies taste and smell fresh. Nice atmosphere apart from the howling wind coming through the doors when you sit down to eat. One of the better kebabs I ever had, even counting the ones I had in Europe, which are sometimes filled with greasy fries. A tad pricey but so are many things in Industry City.

(Translated by Google) Delicious!  Awesome kebab, really good. Prices are adjusted to NYC, so fierce. A piece of home away from home. Recommended!  (Original) Super lecker!  Astreiner Döner, wirklich gut. Die Preise sind an NYC angepasst, also heftig. Ein Stück Heimat weit weg. Empfehlenswert!
Hands down the best Döner in town. The meat is awesome and the Baklava is a dream!
Don’t take all sauce if u don’t like spicy, guy will told u it is not spicy but it will be

OMG I was so happy that I found the Kotti Döner. I am from Berlin and have often eaten kebab. Now I live here since 6 months and didn’t have Döner any more. I missed it. And this Döner is super good and fresh and very delicious. Thank you Kottidöner 😍

This is a great place. Fantastic beer, make sure to order a boot, and food. The potato pancakes are the best version of potatoes I have ever eaten. The owner and staff could not have been better. If you arrive and it seems crowded, don't worry you will be seated surprising fast. Very nice people! Great experience. I will be back.
The flavor of the chicken so good. We had a salad.

Ordered the doner burger and the bun was rock hard. The guy making the sandwich must have known, there's no way you couldn't feel it. Wouldn't waste my time here, enough options here to skip this place.
(Translated by Google) To review  (Original) À revoir
That was amazing.
Yum, yum, and yummy! My favorite part of my meal is at the very end when all that's left are kebab scraps and sauce pooled at the bottom of the plate.
Delicious food for an outrageous price.
So delicious!
Awesome kebab. Friendly staff. Highly recommended.
I had the doner salad with everything. It's literally mixed salad and doner chicken with toppings. They charged me 14 dollars for this.... It's just overpriced for what it is.

When I visited Berlin, I waited 2 hours in line for the "Best Kebabs in town," and this place gives those a serious run for their money! I got the Doner Cone, because I was on the go, and it was perfect. I was pleasantly surprised at how much food there was in the cone, it's dense with perfectly tender chicken, veggies, feta, and their chili sauce. The paper cones in which they serve them are sturdy and leak-proof, so it was no problem munching on my dinner while carrying groceries and maneuvering through my trip home. I'm very impressed - I'll be back!

(Translated by Google) Delicious! This brought me straight back to Germany. Thank you for a great lunch.  (Original) Sehr lecker! This brought me straight back to Germany. Vielen dank fuer ein super mittagsessen.
The wrap was amazing  The other type of bread not as good
Really like in Berlin <3

German girl here, and today was my first time at Kotti. It was really good, the bread was very close to the real thing, I just didn’t find the yogurt sauce to be authentic... it didn’t taste enough like yogurt, it was a little heavier and kinda like ranch compared to the ones in Germany that are more tart. Other than that I really enjoyed it!
Great food but a bit expensive. Recommend the number #1: kotti doner kebab with all the fixings
Great place, delicious food :)

I had read the positive reviews about this place, ended up at DeKalb Market and decided to give it a try, ordering the doner kebab.  The price was a little high, about $11, but the doner kebab was fairly large and stuffed with tender chicken, pickled cabbage, feta cheese and other veggies.  I am a fan of the hot sauce that's included and the doner kebab is made on bread that's got a nice chewy texture.  I would definitely eat here again.
Food is delicious.  Can't wait to go back again

What a place!!!! I love it!! .. if u like Döner this is the place for you.. being originally from Germany I grew up on Döner..😁 this ..it's the real deal! It's Turkish street food that is the No. 1 street food in Germany! It's fresh seasoned meat with veggies and delicious sauce in a fresh baked piece of bread what's hot to love! .. now go and get one!!!
Delicious! The chicken is well marinated

Kebab $15!!!!!!! In Berlin $5..... how can that be..... They only have chicken..... Taste was just ok..... I lived 28 years in Germany.....so I think i know what a good kebab should be....this place....sorry....but no
My goto spot at Dekalb market.
Amazing food, great, friendly staff! I am here every other day & they just added a rice bowl which is a great addition to an already tasty menu
All chicken, doesn't get anymore unauthentic than that :(
